div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
مملوكه يحيى أبو
الواصل على يد نصّار حمل
ما وربع ويبات شعير
وست وجور ثلاثة قرب وثلاثة
حفوص عرفت عرّفت المولا ذالك
وتضعه وما عاقني عن الخروج
إلّا دراهم المولى عرفت عرّفته
ذالك وسلام
إلى ساحل القصير
إبراهيم ابن أبي مفــرّج

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
mamlūku hu yaḥyà ʾabū ***
ăl wāṣilu ʿalà yadi naṣṣāra ḥimlu
māʾ:in wa rbaʿu waybāt:in šaʿīr
wa sittu wuǧūr:in ṯalāṯaẗu qirab:in qurub:in wa ṯalāṯaẗu
ḥufūṣ:in ʿarafta ʿarraftu ăl mawlā ḏālika
wa taḍaʿ hu wa mā ʿāqa nī ʿani ăl ḫurūǧi
ʾillā darāhimu ăl mawlà ʿarafta ʿarraftu hu ø
ḏālika wa salām:un
ʾilà sāḥili ăl quṣayri
ʾibrāhīma ĭbni ʾabī mufarriǧ:in

In the name of God, the Merciful, the Compassionate.
[From] His servant Yaḥyā Abū [...]
To be delivered by Naṣṣār are: one load of
fresh water, four waybas of barley,
six [units of] medicine [wrapped in?] three cases and three
... Dies habe ich dem Patron somit mitgeteilt leather-baskets. [You,] the Master know about this.
... Nothing has prevented me from leaving and coming home Store them [in a safe place]. Nothing will prevent me from sending forward [the aforesaid goods]
Dies habe ich dem Patron somit except [dealing with] your money, my lord. I have informed [you] of this. except [if the payment is made in] silver dirhams. [You,] the Master know
mitgeteilt ... that very well. Peace.
To the shore of [Quseir]
to Ibrāhīm ibn Abū [Mufa]rrij.
